quotes.message: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
quotes.name: Earvin Magic Johnson

quotes.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Being a man or a woman is a matter of birth. Being a man or a woman who makes a difference is a matter of choice.
quotes.name: Byron Garrett

quotes.message: If you think you're too small to make a difference, you've obviously never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.name: Michelle Walker

quotes.message: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
quotes.name: Jenny Craig

quotes.message: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: It's your unlimited power to care and to love that can make the biggest difference in the quality of your life.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Sometimes just a smile on our face can help to make this world a better place. Stand up for the things that are right. Try to talk things out instead of fight. Lend a hand when you can. You can help to make a difference . . .
quotes.name: Robert Alan

quotes.message: When it's all over, it's not who you were. . . it's whether you made a difference.
quotes.name: Robert Joseph Dole

quotes.message: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference, and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.
quotes.name: Sonia Johnson

quotes.message: It's a great satisfaction knowing that for a brief point in time you made a difference.
quotes.name: Irene Natividad

quotes.message: It's not what abilities you have that makes a difference it's what you do with these abilities that's paramount.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Little things done over and over again add up to making a difference in a big way.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: I realize it's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
quotes.name: Yanni

quotes.message: People don't understand that not only can they make a difference, it's their responsibility to do so.
quotes.name: Florence Robinson

quotes.message: There is no greater joy nor greater reward than to make a fundamental difference in someone's life.
quotes.name: Mary Rose Mcgeady

quotes.message: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: You may find that making a difference for others makes the biggest difference in you.
quotes.name: Brian Williams

quotes.message: It is better to have a meaningful life and make a difference than to merely have a long life.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: It takes ONE FAMILY to make a difference in this COMMUNITY. It takes ONE PERSON to make a difference in this FAMILY.
quotes.name: Nisandeh Neta

quotes.message: It's important to see what we can do to make a difference, but it's more important to me to do it every single day.
quotes.name: Alicia Silverstone

quotes.message: We can really make a difference in the world, just one heart, one kind word at a time.
quotes.name: Noelani Musicaro

quotes.message: It is important to nurture any new ideas and initiatives which can make a difference
quotes.name: Wangari Maathai

quotes.message: Don't accept that you can't make a difference. Because if you can't make a difference, you won't make a difference, and if you put a multiplier on that we will continue on an unsustainable pathway.
quotes.name: Maurice Strong

quotes.message: None of us alone can save the nation or world. But each of us can make a positive difference if we commit ourselves to do so.
quotes.name: Cornel West

quotes.message: To make a difference in someone's life, you don't have to be brilliant, rich, beautiful, or perfect. You just have to care.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Go out and make a difference in your community. You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: Any time you have an opportunity to make a difference in this world and you don't, then you are wasting your time on Earth.
quotes.name: Roberto Clemente

quotes.message: You're not considered different until you have made a difference.
quotes.name: Andoni Garcia

quotes.message: If you feel rooted in your home and family, if you're active in your community, there's nothing more empowering. The best way to make a difference in the world is to start by making a difference in your own life.
quotes.name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quotes.message: Every day of our lives we are on the verge of making those slight changes that would make all the difference.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Whether you live to be 50 or 100 makes no difference, if you made no difference in the world.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: To make a difference in the world, it only takes one optimistic person, who can gather millions of people to make the change.
quotes.name: Gia Russell

quotes.message: Learn to appreciate every moment of your life, stop thinking of the future too much, you have a choice to make a difference in your life at any time you wish.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Never give up on you. In order to make a difference you would have to somehow be different.
quotes.name: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.message: If you want to make a difference, think different.
quotes.name: Palle Oswald

quotes.message: It doesn't really matter to me how I make a difference, I just wanna make sure that I do.
quotes.name: Clay Aiken

quotes.message: If you desire to make a difference in the world, you must be different from the world.
quotes.name: Elaine S. Dalton

quotes.message: Those little things can add up to make a big difference.
quotes.name: Tim Mcavoy

quotes.message: I had the ability to make a difference, even if I didn't know what that difference was yet.
quotes.name: Lorna Shultz Nicholson

quotes.message: God made you different so you can make a difference.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We may not have the ability to change all of the world's wrongs, but we can make a difference where we are.
quotes.name: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.message: One person really can make a difference. Each person is the revolution.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Small acts of kindness can make a difference in other peoples lives more than we can imagine.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: But you can make a difference, everyone can do that too. May those who can use the help, receive what they ought to.
quotes.name: Julie Hebert

quotes.message: A small change can make a big difference.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The truth is anyone can be the difference; all it takes is using whatever you have, to do whatever you can.
quotes.name: Darius Graham

quotes.message: Every individual matters. Every individual has a role to play. Every individual makes a difference.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: What counts in life is not the mere fact that we have lived. It is what difference we have made to the lives of others that will determine the significance of the life we lead.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: You change the world by being yourself.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Anyone who thinks that they are too small to make a difference has never tried to fall asleep with a mosquito in the room.
quotes.name: Christine Todd Whitman

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: We tried in our simple way to lead our life in a manner that may make a difference to those of others.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Do not wait for leaders. Do it alone, person to person.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: One person can make a difference.
quotes.name: Raoul Wallenberg

quotes.message: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
quotes.name: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.message: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The only way to make a difference is to acquire power.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: To know is to care, to care is to act, to act is to make a difference.
quotes.name: Harry Chapin

quotes.message: Each one of us can make a difference. Together we make a change.
quotes.name: Barbara Mikulski

quotes.message: When you encourage others, you in the process are encouraged because you’re making a commitment and difference in that person’s life. Encouragement really does make a difference.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Throw yourself into life as someone who makes a difference, accepting that you may not understand how or why.
quotes.name: Benjamin Zander

quotes.message: Heart is what makes a difference.
quotes.name: Jerry Sloan

quotes.message: Everybody wants to make a difference, but nobody wants to be different. And you simply cannot have one without the other.
quotes.name: Andy Andrews

quotes.message: Dreamers dream about things being different. Visionaries envision themselves making a difference.
quotes.name: Andy Stanley

quotes.message: There's always an opportunity to make a difference.
quotes.name: Michael Dell

quotes.message: If you give up on the idea that your voice can make a difference, then other voices will fill the void.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: A difference is a difference only if it makes a difference.
quotes.name: Darrell Huff
